name: Street Rhapsody: The End's Flow
description:
This game was made by two people, we hope you enjoy what is here to see.
The story is about a lost musician who is looking for inspiration and then finds it, starting something new. 

The end of the game is a bit broken though, we didn't get to finish on time, so we're quite disappointed but we worked very hard for this, every single day almost no sleep.  

However, we intend to complete this game with more story in the future, so please stay tuned. We literally crunched this to the absolute last minute. So please forgive the last second faults.

Discord link to stay updated on the project: https://discord.gg/9CrckCDP
